name: Silverback Elder
type_line: Creature — Ape Shaman
oracle_text:
Whenever you cast a creature spell, choose one —
• Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
• Look at the top five cards of your library. You may put a land card from among them onto the battlefield tapped. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
• You gain 4 life.

name: Urza Assembles the Titans
type_line: Enchantment — Saga
oracle_text:
Read ahead (Choose a chapter and start with that many lore counters. Add one after your draw step. Skipped chapters don't trigger. Sacrifice after III.)
I—Scry 4, then you may reveal the top card of your library. if a planeswalker card is revealed this way, put it into your hand.
II—You may put a planeswalker card with mana value 6 or less from your hand onto the battlefield.
III—You may activate the loyalty abilities of planeswalkers you control twice this turn rather than only once.

name: Kumano Faces Kakkazan // Etching of Kumano
type_line: Enchantment — Saga // Enchantment Creature — Human Shaman

card_faces.name: Kumano Faces Kakkazan
card_faces.oracle_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter.)
I — Kumano Faces Kakkazan deals 1 damage to each opponent and each planeswalker they control.
II — When you cast your next creature spell this turn, that creature enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
III — Exile this Saga, then return it to the battlefield transformed under your control.
card_faces.printed_text:
（于此传纪进战场时及于你抓牌步骤后，加一个学问指示物。）
I — 熊野大战渴苛斩向每位对手和每个由对手操控的鹏洛客各造成1点伤害。
II — 本回合中，当你施放你的下一个生物咒语，该生物进战场时上面额外有一个+1/+1指示物。
III — 放逐此传纪，然后将它在你的操控下移回战场且已转化。

card_faces.name: Etching of Kumano
card_faces.oracle_text:
Haste
If a creature dealt damage this turn by a source you controlled would die, exile it instead.
card_faces.printed_text:
敏捷
如果本回合中受过由你操控之来源伤害的生物将死去，则改为将它放逐。
card_faces.flavor_text: 许多神明前来求索熊野自己也不知道的秘密，然而全都无功而返。

Haste

card_faces.name: Remnant of the Rising Star
card_faces.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {X}. When you do, put X +1/+1 counters on that creature.
As long as you control five or more modified creatures, Remnant of the Rising Star gets +5/+5 and has trample. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)
card_faces.printed_text:
飛行
每當另一個生物在你的操控下進戰場時，你可以支付{X}。當你如此作時，在該生物上放置X個+1/+1指示物。
只要你操控五個或更多有飾裝的生物，珠眼遺形便得+5/+5且具有踐踏異能。（武具，指示物，以及由你操控的靈氣均為飾裝。）

card_faces.name: Remnant of the Rising Star
card_faces.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {X}. When you do, put X +1/+1 counters on that creature.
As long as you control five or more modified creatures, Remnant of the Rising Star gets +5/+5 and has trample. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)
card_faces.printed_text:
Vuela.
Siempre que otra criatura entre al campo de batalla bajo tu control, puedes pagar {X}. Cuando lo hagas, pon X contadores +1/+1 sobre esa criatura.
Mientras controles cinco o más criaturas modificadas, los Restos de la estrella ascendente obtienen +5/+5 y tienen la habilidad de arrollar. (Las Auras que controlas, los Equipos y los contadores son modificaciones.)

name: Jugan Defends the Temple // Remnant of the Rising Star
type_line: Enchantment — Saga // Enchantment Creature — Dragon Spirit

card_faces.name: Jugan Defends the Temple
card_faces.oracle_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter.)
I — Create a 1/1 green Human Monk creature token with "{T}: Add {G}."
II — Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.
III — Exile this Saga, then return it to the battlefield transformed under your control.
card_faces.printed_text:
(이 서사시가 들어오면서 그리고 당신의 뽑기단 후에, 전승 카운터 한 개를 추가한다.)
I — "{T}: {G}를 추가한다."를 가진 1/1 녹색 인간 승려 생물 토큰 한 개를 만든다.
II — 생물을 최대 두 개까지 목표로 정한다. 그 생물들에 각각 +1/+1 카운터 한 개를 올려놓는다.
III — 이 서사시를 추방한 후, 변신된 채로 당신의 조종하에 전장으로 되돌린다.

card_faces.name: Remnant of the Rising Star
card_faces.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {X}. When you do, put X +1/+1 counters on that creature.
As long as you control five or more modified creatures, Remnant of the Rising Star gets +5/+5 and has trample. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)
card_faces.printed_text:
비행
다른 생물이 당신의 조종하에 전장에 들어올 때마다, 당신은 {X}를 지불할 수 있다. 그렇게 할 때, 그 생물에 +1/+1 카운터 X개를 올려놓는다.
당신이 수정된 생물을 다섯 개 이상 조종하는 한, 떠오르는 별의 잔해는 +5/+5를 받고 돌진을 가진다. (장비, 당신이 조종하는 마법진, 카운터들이 수정 사항이다.)

card_faces.printed_text: 돌진, 신속
card_faces.flavor_text:
"카미 전쟁의 여파로, 카미가와는 끊임 없는 전쟁 상태로 전락해 버렸다. 쿄다이의 지혜가 그들을 인도했음에도 불구하고, 최초의 제국군이 부족들을 굴복시키고 이 땅에 평화를 가져온 것은 수십 년 동안 유혈사태가 벌어지고 난 후였다."
—*제국의 역사*

name: The Shattered States Era // Nameless Conqueror
type_line: Enchantment — Saga // Enchantment Creature — Human Samurai

card_faces.name: The Shattered States Era
card_faces.oracle_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter.)
I — Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn.
II — Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
III — Exile this Saga, then return it to the battlefield transformed under your control.
card_faces.printed_text:
(Mentre questa Saga entra e dopo la tua sottofase di acquisizione, aggiungi un segnalino sapere.)
I — Prendi il controllo di una creatura bersaglio fino alla fine del turno. STAPpala. Ha rapidità fino alla fine del turno.
II — Le creature che controlli prendono +1/+0 fino alla fine del turno.
III — Esilia questa Saga, poi rimettila sul campo di battaglia trasformata sotto il tuo controllo.

card_faces.name: Nameless Conqueror
card_faces.oracle_text: Trample, haste
card_faces.printed_text: Travolgere, rapidità
card_faces.flavor_text:
"Sulla scia della Guerra dei Kami, Kamigawa crollò in uno stato di conflitto perenne. Anche con la saggezza di Kyodai a guidarli, servirono decenni di sforzi e spargimenti di sangue perché i primi Imperiali sottomettessero i clan e riportassero la pace."
—*Storia dell'Impero*

name: The Shattered States Era // Nameless Conqueror
type_line: Enchantment — Saga // Enchantment Creature — Human Samurai

card_faces.name: The Shattered States Era
card_faces.oracle_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter.)
I — Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn.
II — Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
III — Exile this Saga, then return it to the battlefield transformed under your control.
card_faces.printed_text:
（于此传纪进战场时及于你抓牌步骤后，加一个学问指示物。）
I — 获得目标生物的操控权直到回合结束。将它重置。它获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。
II — 由你操控的生物得+1/+0直到回合结束。
III — 放逐此传纪，然后将它在你的操控下移回战场且已转化。

card_faces.name: Nameless Conqueror
card_faces.oracle_text: Trample, haste
card_faces.printed_text: 践踏，敏捷
card_faces.flavor_text:
「逆神之战过后，神河仍深陷战争乱世。纵有香醍辅佐，始帝家亦经数十载惨烈战斗方才平定各方，令和平重回大地。」
～*《帝国通史》*

card_faces.flavor_text:
「逆神之戰過後，神河仍深陷戰爭亂世。縱有香醍輔佐，始帝家亦經數十載慘烈戰鬥方才平定各方，令和平重回大地。」

name: The Shattered States Era // Nameless Conqueror
type_line: Enchantment — Saga // Enchantment Creature — Human Samurai

card_faces.name: The Shattered States Era
card_faces.oracle_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter.)
I — Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn.
II — Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
III — Exile this Saga, then return it to the battlefield transformed under your control.
card_faces.printed_text:
(Je eine Sagenmarke beim Ins-Spiel-Kommen und nach deinem Ziehsegment.)
I — Übernimm bis zum Ende des Zuges die Kontrolle über eine Kreatur deiner Wahl. Enttappe sie. Sie erhält Eile bis zum Ende des Zuges.
II — Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst, erhalten +1/+0 bis zum Ende des Zuges.
III — Schicke diese Sage ins Exil und bringe sie dann transformiert unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel zurück.

card_faces.name: Nameless Conqueror
card_faces.oracle_text: Trample, haste
card_faces.printed_text: Verursacht Trampelschaden, Eile
card_faces.flavor_text:
„Als Folge des Kami-Krieges versank Kamigawa in einen Zustand andauernden Krieges. Obwohl Kyodais Weisheit sie leitete, kostete es die ersten kaiserlichen Truppen Jahrzehnte, um die Clans zu unterwerfen und dem Land Frieden zu bringen."
—*Geschichte des Kaiserreichs*

Reach
If a creature an opponent controls would die, exile it instead. When you do, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

{1}{B}, Sacrifice two Saprolings: Draw a card.

name: Rivaz of the Claw
type_line: Legendary Creature — Viashino Warlock
oracle_text:
Menace
{T}: Add two mana in any combination of colors. Spend this mana only to cast Dragon creature spells.
Once during each of your turns, you may cast a Dragon creature spell from your graveyard.
Whenever you cast a Dragon creature spell from your graveyard, it gains "When this creature dies, exile it."
